name.ru: PoE Ninja перенаправление на торговую площадку
name.zh_TW: PoE Ninja 重新導向交易市集

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click redirection from poe.ninja to the Path of Exile trade.
short.ko: Ninja 웹사이트의 장비를 Path of Exile 공식 거래소로 한 번에 리다이렉트하며, 접두사와 접미사를 한국어로 표시합니다.
short.ru: Перенаправление снаряжения с сайта Ninja на официальную торговую площадку Path of Exile с русифицированными аффиксами.
short.zh_TW: 忍者網裝備一鍵重導向至流亡黯道官方交易市集，附加詞綴中文化。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## Features
- Equipments, flasks, jewels, and gems can be quickly redirected to the official trade market with a single click, while applying filters for modifiers (and for gems, filtering by quality and gem level).
- Equipments, flasks, and jewels modifiers localized in Chinese.

## v1.1.3 (2024/08/16)
- Added popup version display.
- Added automatic synchronization of the latest mods file from GitHub.
- Refactored the initialization method for settings.
- Fixed SyntaxError caused by parsing multiple #% in the suffix.

## v1.1.2 (2024/07/29)
- Updated data for 3.25.
- Removed unnecessary spaces before and after modifiers when processing.
- Removed blank entries from the dictionary file and used a minified JSON file to reduce file size.
- Added support for Korean and Russian languages.

## v1.1.1 (2024/07/28)
- Optimized the settings interface for more intuitive navigation.
- Fixed the issue where gems could not be successfully searched in the Taiwan server.

## v1.1.0 (2024/07/26)
- Added options for international and Taiwan servers.
- Added option to display Chinese and English simultaneously.
- Fixed the issue where line break modifier matching failed.
- Fixed the issue where the program could not run if modifier matching failed.
- Removed unnecessary permission requests.

## v1.0.0 (2024/07/25)
- Added support for items, flasks, and jewels.
- Added support for gems search.
- Added toggle for debug mode.
- Added Chinese localization add-on for modifiers.
- Significantly optimized the method for modifiers search, enhancing the efficiency and accuracy of modifiers matching.
- Added Chinese README instructions.
- Added DEMO images and installation tutorial images.


Issue / PR GitHub Page: https://github.com/iwtba4188/poe_ninja_redirect_to_trade
long.ko:
## Features
- 장비, 포션, 보석 및 보석을 한 번에 공식 거래 시장으로 이동시키고, 동시에 접미사 필터를 적용합니다(보석의 경우 품질과 보석 등급).
- 장비, 포션 및 보석의 접미사를 한국어로 번역합니다.

## v1.1.3 (2024/08/16)
- Added popup version display.
- Added automatic synchronization of the latest mods file from GitHub.
- Refactored the initialization method for settings.
- Fixed SyntaxError caused by parsing multiple #% in the suffix.

## v1.1.2 (2024/07/29)
- Updated data for 3.25.
- Removed unnecessary spaces before and after modifiers when processing.
- Removed blank entries from the dictionary file and used a minified JSON file to reduce file size.
- Added support for Korean and Russian languages.

## v1.1.1 (2024/07/28)
- Optimized the settings interface for more intuitive navigation.
- Fixed the issue where gems could not be successfully searched in the Taiwan server.

## v1.1.0 (2024/07/26)
- Added options for international and Taiwan servers.
- Added option to display Chinese and English simultaneously.
- Fixed the issue where line break modifier matching failed.
- Fixed the issue where the program could not run if modifier matching failed.
- Removed unnecessary permission requests.

## v1.0.0 (2024/07/25)
- Added support for items, flasks, and jewels.
- Added support for gems search.
- Added toggle for debug mode.
- Added Chinese localization add-on for modifiers.
- Significantly optimized the method for modifiers search, enhancing the efficiency and accuracy of modifiers matching.
- Added Chinese README instructions.
- Added DEMO images and installation tutorial images.

long.ru:
## Features
- Оборудование, зелья, ювелирные изделия и драгоценные камни направляются в официальный торговый рынок одним нажатием кнопки, применяя фильтрацию по аффиксам (для драгоценных камней - это качество и уровень драгоценных камней).
- Русская локализация аффиксов для оборудования, зелий и ювелирных изделий.

## v1.1.3 (2024/08/16)
- Added popup version display.
- Added automatic synchronization of the latest mods file from GitHub.
- Refactored the initialization method for settings.
- Fixed SyntaxError caused by parsing multiple #% in the suffix.

## v1.1.2 (2024/07/29)
- Updated data for 3.25.
- Removed unnecessary spaces before and after modifiers when processing.
- Removed blank entries from the dictionary file and used a minified JSON file to reduce file size.
- Added support for Korean and Russian languages.

## v1.1.1 (2024/07/28)
- Optimized the settings interface for more intuitive navigation.
- Fixed the issue where gems could not be successfully searched in the Taiwan server.

## v1.1.0 (2024/07/26)
- Added options for international and Taiwan servers.
- Added option to display Chinese and English simultaneously.
- Fixed the issue where line break modifier matching failed.
- Fixed the issue where the program could not run if modifier matching failed.
- Removed unnecessary permission requests.

## v1.0.0 (2024/07/25)
- Added support for items, flasks, and jewels.
- Added support for gems search.
- Added toggle for debug mode.
- Added Chinese localization add-on for modifiers.
- Significantly optimized the method for modifiers search, enhancing the efficiency and accuracy of modifiers matching.
- Added Chinese README instructions.
- Added DEMO images and installation tutorial images.


Issue / PR GitHub Page: https://github.com/iwtba4188/poe_ninja_redirect_to_trade
long.zh_TW:
## Features
- 裝備、藥劑、珠寶及寶石一鍵導向官方交易市集，同時套用詞綴篩選（寶石則為品質與寶石等級）。
- 裝備、藥劑及珠寶的詞綴中文化。

## v1.1.3 (2024/08/16)
- 新增 popup 版本顯示。
- 新增自動同步 GitHub 最新的詞綴表。
- 重構設定初始化方法。
- 修正詞綴中多個 `#%` 解析錯誤導致的 SyntaxError。

## v1.1.2 (2024/07/29)
- 更新 3.25 的資料。
- 處理詞綴時，去除詞綴前後不必要的空格。
- 移除字典檔中空白的 entries，並使用 minify 後的 json 檔，以減少檔案大小。
- 新增韓文和俄文的支援。

## v1.1.1 (2024/07/28)
- 優化設定介面，現在變得更直觀了。
- 修正台服寶石無法成功搜尋的問題。

## v1.1.0 (2024/07/26)
- 新增國際服和台服的選項。
- 新增中英文同時顯示的選項。
- 修正換行詞綴配對失敗的問題。
- 修正詞綴配對失敗即無法運行的問題。
- 移除不必要的權限請求。

## v1.0.0 (2024/07/25)
- 新增物品、藥劑及珠寶的支援。
- 新增寶石搜尋的支援。
- 新增 debug 模式的切換。
- 新增詞墜中文化附加功能。
- 大幅優化詞墜查找方法，詞墜配對效率與準確度提高了。
- 新增中文 README 說明。
- 新增 DEMO 圖片與安裝教學圖片。


Issue / PR GitHub Page: https://github.com/iwtba4188/poe_ninja_redirect_to_trade
